page.title: 20SHOPPING WEEK
page.content: Stromness Shopping Week is the annual gala week in July.It was started to boost trade after World War 2.A shopping week queen is chosen by the secondary school,but there is no king. It caters for all age ranges and interests.There are lots of competitions ,like searchwords,odd one out,odd views,round the town races in fancy dress,sand castle building , greasy pole climbs over the pier,a swimming gala at the local pool,pet & baby shows,and sea based activities.In the past the show people came with 'fair' activities but now there's little except ',housie housie, candyfloss and goldfish.Now there's groups brought from other parts to entertain at the pierhead and dances. On the last night there is a big parade of floats and a firework display.A big night out for some folk.
